title: Hi, I'm Josh Cobert
paragraph: Thanks for paying me a visit. I am a software developer and creative professional. I like long walks on the beach and refactoring code. Please check out some of the projects I have worked on and feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate!

title: Projects
paragraph: Here's a selection of projects that I've worked on - a blend of solo creations and collaborative endeavors.

title: Who is this Guy?
paragraph: A great question! As I'm sure your time is valuable, I'll try to keep this brief.

title: Contact Me
paragraph: Please feel free to reach out with any questions, suggestions, or opportunities you may have!
